artist: Jack Larsen; Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description:
3/8" horiz. strips of leather woven alternately with smooth and split side of hide on face. Black warp. White leather and/or vinyl, 3/8-1/2" wide, separated by 3 shots of white yarn.
Stapled to 11x8/2" card.
Light scrim on reverse.  Slightly different than 99.1.1012.29. (black & white)
title: Leather Cloth
